isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - HOOD, GRILLE AND FENDERS - IC BUS - ADJUSTMENTS - RADIATOR

svcsubproc.title: Forward Radiator Adjustment

calloutgroup.callout1: A. DRIVER SIDE ENLARGED VIEW IN CIRCLE A
B. PASSENGER SIDE ENLARGED VIEW IN DIRECTION OF ARROW IN CIRCLE B

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 17 for Items in parentheses.
To adjust the top of the radiator (Item 1) forward, lengthen the driver and passenger side upper stay rods (Item 2) at the top of the radiator as follows.

step1.para: Release the hood latches and tilt the hood assembly to full open position.

Loosen and move forward the hex nut (Item 3) on the radiator side of the upper stay rod brackets (Item 4) on driver and passenger side of the radiator (Item 1), driver side enlarged view in circle A and passenger side enlarged view in direction of arrow in circle B shown.

Slide components, lockwasher, flat washers, insulators and spacer (Items 5, 6, 7 and 8) forward on both sides of the upper stay rod brackets (Item 4), move forward, and tighten the hex nut (Item 9) on the stay rod side of the upper stay rod brackets on driver and passenger side of the radiator (Item 1); driver side enlarged view in circle A and passenger side enlarged view in direction of arrow in circle B shown.
Check the position of the radiator; if required, repeat above procedure until radiator is properly located.
Close and latch the hood on both sides.

svcsubproc.title: Rearward Radiator Adjustment
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 17 for Items in parentheses.
To adjust the top of the radiator (Item 1) rearward, shorten the driver and passenger side upper stay rods (Item 2) at the top of the radiator as follows.

step1.para: Release the hood latches and tilt the hood assembly to full open position.

Loosen and move rearward the hex nut (Item 9) on the stay rod side of the upper stay rod brackets (Item 4) on driver and passenger side of the radiator (Item 1); driver side enlarged view in circle A and passenger side enlarged view in direction of arrow in circle B shown.

Slide components, flat washers, insulators, spacer and lockwasher (Items 6, 7, 8 and 5) rearward on both sides of the upper stay rod brackets (Item 4), move rearward, and tighten the hex nut (Item 3) on the radiator side of the upper stay rod brackets on driver and passenger side of the radiator (Item 1); driver side enlarged view in circle A and passenger side enlarged view in direction of arrow in circle B shown.
Check the position of the radiator; if required, repeat above procedure until radiator is properly located.
Close and latch the hood on both sides.
